entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
